author: Sorcha Pollak
title: Members of same household may exercise together, Government confirms
description: Department of Taoiseach clarifies Covid-19 rules about exercising within 2km radius
content:
Members of the same household are allowed to take physical exercise together under Government restrictions during the coronavirus pandemic, the Department of the Taoiseach has confirmed. 
The Government clarification comes after some confusion emerged around… [+1836 chars]
